languages.text: "Послушай, эттфатер. Когда волчьи жрецы испытывали меня, я отправился к Вратам Моркаи — в темное место, где реальность и думы Великих волков сплетаются, словно щупальца кракена. Всякому является свое видение у Врат, я же узрел... темное предвестье. Был там я, и был там другой я — один белый, словно луна, другой черный, словно штормовое небо. И я бился с собой".

"Listen, Aett-Vater. When the Wolf Priests tested me, I went to the Gate of Morkai, a dark place where realspace and the thoughts of the Great Wolves intertwine like the tentacles of a kraken. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."
languages.original_text: "Послушай, эттфатер. Когда волчьи жрецы испытывали меня, я отправился к Вратам Моркаи — в темное место, где реальность и думы Великих волков сплетаются, словно щупальца кракена. Всякому является свое видение у Врат, я же узрел... темное предвестье. Был там я, и был там другой я — один белый, словно луна, другой черный, словно штормовое небо. И я бился с собой".

Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

languages.text: “听着，狼领。当野狼祭司考验我的时候，我去了莫凯之门。那是个阴暗的地方，在那里，真实世界与头狼的思想领域仿佛海怪的触须一样，交织在一起。来到莫凯之门的每个人，都会看到各自不同的幻景，而我看到的……是不祥的预兆。我看到自己变成了两个人，其中一个像明亮的月亮一样洁白，而另一个像低垂的天空一样漆黑，两个我正在激烈地交战。”
languages.original_text: "Listen, Aett-Vater. When the Wolf Priests tested me, I went to the Gate of Morkai, a dark place where realspace and the thoughts of the Great Wolves intertwine like the tentacles of a kraken. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

traits.locale_text: “听着，狼领。当野狼祭司考验我的时候，我去了莫凯之门。那是个阴暗的地方，在那里，真实世界与头狼的思想领域仿佛海怪的触须一样，交织在一起。来到莫凯之门的每个人，都会看到各自不同的幻景，而我看到的……是不祥的预兆。我看到自己变成了两个人，其中一个像明亮的月亮一样洁白，而另一个像低垂的天空一样漆黑，两个我正在激烈地交战。”

languages.text: 「聴け、アエット＝ヴァテル。牙狼法師が俺で実験を行い、俺がモルカイの門に行ったときの話だ。リアルスペースの暗い場所で、大狼の思考がクラーケンの触手のように絡みついてくる。門の前に現れた奴らは全員、ヴィジョンを与えられた、そして俺に与えられたのは…暗いものだった。俺が見たのは、2種類の俺だった…ひとりは月のように白く、もうひとりは一雨来そうな空のように黒い。ふたりは戦闘中だった」
languages.original_text: "Listen, Aett-Vater. When the Wolf Priests tested me, I went to the Gate of Morkai, a dark place where realspace and the thoughts of the Great Wolves intertwine like the tentacles of a kraken. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

traits.locale_text: 「聴け、アエット＝ヴァテル。牙狼法師が俺で実験を行い、俺がモルカイの門に行ったときの話だ。リアルスペースの暗い場所で、大狼の思考がクラーケンの触手のように絡みついてくる。門の前に現れた奴らは全員、ヴィジョンを与えられた、そして俺に与えられたのは…暗いものだった。俺が見たのは、2種類の俺だった…ひとりは月のように白く、もうひとりは一雨来そうな空のように黒い。ふたりは戦闘中だった」

languages.text: «Escuche, Aett-Vater. Cuando los Sacerdotes Lobo me pusieron a prueba, fui a la Puerta de Morkai, un lugar siniestro donde el espacio real y los pensamientos de los Grandes Lobos se entrelazan como los tentáculos de un kraken. Todos los que se presentan ante la Puerta reciben una visión. La mía fue... un presagio siniestro. Me vi con dos aspectos, uno blanco como la luna y el otro negro como la noche. Ambos estaban enzarzados en combate».
languages.original_text: "Listen, Aett-Vater. When the Wolf Priests tested me, I went to the Gate of Morkai, a dark place where realspace and the thoughts of the Great Wolves intertwine like the tentacles of a kraken. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

traits.locale_text: «Escuche, Aett-Vater. Cuando los Sacerdotes Lobo me pusieron a prueba, fui a la Puerta de Morkai, un lugar siniestro donde el espacio real y los pensamientos de los Grandes Lobos se entrelazan como los tentáculos de un kraken. Todos los que se presentan ante la Puerta reciben una visión. La mía fue... un presagio siniestro. Me vi con dos aspectos, uno blanco como la luna y el otro negro como la noche. Ambos estaban enzarzados en combate».

languages.text: « Écoutez, aett-vater. Quand les Prêtres Loups m'ont mis à l'épreuve, j'ai dû me rendre à la porte de Morkaï, un lieu ténébreux où l'espace réel et les pensées des Grands Loups s'entremêlent comme les tentacules d'un kraken. Tous ceux qui se présentent devant la porte reçoivent une vision, et la mienne fut... un mauvais présage. Je me suis vu sous deux formes : l'une blanche comme la lune et l'autre aussi noire que le ciel nocturne. Et les deux se livraient un combat sans merci. »
languages.original_text: "Listen, Aett-Vater. When the Wolf Priests tested me, I went to the Gate of Morkai, a dark place where realspace and the thoughts of the Great Wolves intertwine like the tentacles of a kraken. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

traits.locale_text: « Écoutez, aett-vater. Quand les prêtres-loups m'ont mis à l'épreuve, j'ai dû me rendre à la porte de Morkaï, un lieu ténébreux où l'espace réel et les pensées des Grands Loups s'entremêlent comme les tentacules d'un kraken. Tous ceux qui se présentent devant la porte reçoivent une vision, et la mienne fut... un mauvais présage. Je me suis vu sous deux formes : l'une blanche comme la lune et l'autre aussi noire que le ciel nocturne. Et les deux se livraient un combat sans merci. »

languages.text: "Hört zu, Aett-Vater. Bei meiner Prüfung durch die Wolfspriester musste ich zum Portal des Morkai, ein dunkler Ort, wo Realraum und die Gedanken der Großen Wölfe einander umschlingen wie die Tentakel eines Kraken. Allen, die vor dem Portal erscheinen, wird eine Vision gewährt, und meine war ... ein finsteres Omen. Ich sah mich selbst in zwei Erscheinungsformen – eine weiß wie der Mond, die andere schwarz wie der Sturmhimmel. Und beide kämpften miteinander."
languages.original_text: "Listen, Aett-Vater. When the Wolf Priests tested me, I went to the Gate of Morkai, a dark place where realspace and the thoughts of the Great Wolves intertwine like the tentacles of a kraken. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

traits.locale_text: "Hört zu, Aett-Vater. Bei meiner Prüfung durch die Wolfspriester musste ich zum Portal des Morkai, ein dunkler Ort, wo Realraum und die Gedanken der Großen Wölfe einander umschlingen wie die Tentakel eines Kraken. Allen, die vor dem Portal erscheinen, wird eine Vision gewährt, und meine war ... ein finsteres Omen. Ich sah mich selbst in zwei Erscheinungsformen – eine weiß wie der Mond, die andere schwarz wie der Sturmhimmel. Und beide kämpften miteinander."

languages.text: "Dinle beni Aett-Vater. Kurt Rahipler beni imtihana soktuğunda Morkai Geçidi'ne gittim. Gerçekuzay ile Ulu Kurtlar'ın düşüncelerinin krakenin dokunaçları gibi birbirine karıştığı, karanlık bir yerdi. Geçit'in önünde duran herkese bir görü bahşedilir. Benimkisi ise... Kara bir alametti. Kendimi iki farklı biçimde gördüm. Biri ay gibi beyaz, ötekiyse fırtınalı gökler gibi karaydı. Birbirleriyle kavgaya tutuşmuşlardı."
languages.original_text: "Listen, Aett-Vater. When the Wolf Priests tested me, I went to the Gate of Morkai, a dark place where realspace and the thoughts of the Great Wolves intertwine like the tentacles of a kraken. Everyone who appears before the Gate is granted a vision, and mine was... a dark omen. I saw myself, in two guises — one as white as the moon, the other as black as the lowering sky. And the two were locked in combat."

traits.locale_text: "Dinle beni Aett-Vater. Kurt rahipler beni imtihana soktuğunda Morkai'ın Geçidi'ne gittim. Gerçekuzay ile Yüce Kurtların düşüncelerinin kraken dokunaçları gibi birbirine karıştığı, karanlık bir yerdi. Geçidin önünde duran herkese bir görü bahşedilir. Benimki ise... Kara bir alametti. Kendimi iki farklı biçimde gördüm. Biri ay gibi beyaz, diğeriyse bastıran gökler gibi karaydı. Birbirleriyle savaşıyorlardı."
